DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether patient positioning ( prone supine positioning ) contribute success extubation immediate postextubation period preterm infant .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Between Preterm Infants Who Are Placed Their Back Stomach Immediate Postextubation Period
DOC.detailed_description: This study double-blinded randomize controlled trial , whose aim compare proportion successful extubation preterm infant immediately extubation . Methods : Participants recruit neonatal intensive care unit ( NICU ) divide two group ( supine prone ) position respective group extubation . A clinical evaluation form parameter collection form ( respiratory rate , heart rate , saturation peripheral oxygen , fraction inspire oxygen temperature ) use fill extubation 48 hour professional staff NICU . It consider successful extubation participant stay extubated 48 hour extubation .
DOC.criteria: Newborns le 37 week gestation age ( calculated doctor use method Capurro/Ballard ) Newborns undergone invasive mechanical ventilation first week life , 48 hour Newborns present malformation clinical surgical condition preclude position prone supine extubation
